helper-text.logo: Please select an image of type png or jpeg. Size should be less than 500kb and It should be a aquare image otherwise it will be distorted.
helper-text.theme-color: This Color will be shown when user opens your store and It also will be shown to you, when you would switch to store mode.

description.moreCharThanLimit: It should not be more than 700 characters.

messages.logoSize: Size of the logo should be less than 500 KB
